content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at Position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe Group (steam) connecting from Position (x=3.5, y=17.5) to Position (x=10.5, y=21.5)
- Pipe Group (water) connecting from Position (x=-9.5, y=23.5) to Position (x=-0.5, y=23.5)
- Electricity Group with poles at various positions including (x=27.5, y=26.5), (x=20.5, y=19.5), (x=3.5, y=20.5), etc.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connections between entities such as boilers and steam engines are correctly aligned and within the same fluid system. Misalignment or incorrect fluid system connections can lead to failures in establishing connections.
